<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">        BytesToHash = Prev&#91;TI.toArrayIndex()&#93;.Hash;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">      S.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3/#ad247de2450380eeba2fab0e794d5e44f">update</a>(BytesToHash);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">    Off = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea60baadb22e80b147e4885ad16760e569">Ref</a>.Offset + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea60baadb22e80b147e4885ad16760e569">Ref</a>.Count &#42; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex">TypeIndex</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t forget to add in any trailing bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TrailingBytes = RecordData.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a55089293ebaccd683a82d97170041376">drop&#95;front</a>(Off);</Highlight></CodeLine>
